pages.title: Manaweaving
pages.text: Mana Gems aren't only useful for runes or jewelry. Oh no, they can do a lot. One of those more obscure uses is to create a something called Manaweave. This iridescent rainbow-colored string is far stronger than any fabric could ever hope to be, putting even kevlar to shame.
A string of Manaweave is used to Awaken a Golden Ring. If one is expert enough, through the use of an Anvil a Manasmith can awaken a Golden Ring with a single piece of Manaweave.
